channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaspersky -- TightVNC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaspersky -- TightVNC

item.title: CVE-2019-8287|2024-08-04T21:17:31.162Z -- kaspersky -- tightvnc
item.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains global buffer overflow in HandleCoRREBBP macro function, which can potentially result code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.
